field.name: summary
field.value: DiggStylePagination viewcomponent render elipsis between page 2 and 3

field.name: description
field.value:
When adjacents is set to 2 (default) and you are at page 5, the component will render: 1 2 ... 3 4 5 6 7 ... 11 12
In this case, it should not render elipsis between 2 and 3.

comment.author: gauthier
comment.text:
Attached mr-diggstylepagination-adjacent-bug.patch contains a simple test case and correction for review.
I just added condition check before calling to WriteEllipsis call in the Render method

comment.author: roelofb
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Applied''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
